Docs.summary: The DataSetSchema class represents the structure, or schema, of a data source. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the DataSetSchema class to list the elements of a data source at design time. This implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> uses a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to list the views and fields.
The DataSetSchema class is used by custom control designer components to provide lists of views and fields for data-bound controls at design time.
To examine the components of data using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the following classes:
- DataSetSchema
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>
